Text: You might want to turn that "720" into "720p", because that's what it is, and your releases won't show up for people searching for 720p.
Yep, just being lazy, 720p from now on
I can also confirm that the AC3 audio is a problem. All to the right channel. Shame it wasn't checked before uploading.
Thank you very much for your time and effort to share this with us.
